answers.answer: I have a specific date and a specific amount I want to lose -  but clicked on the date option as thats the most ridgid for me.
No i just wanna loss to be a health and free diabetes ,heart decease.
I want to lose weight in general but also have a specific date.

question: In thinking about your main motivation for weight loss, are you most focused on losing weight by a certain date (e.g. I want to lose weight for a wedding or graduation), on losing a certain amount of weight (e.g. I just want to lose 15 pounds), or on weight loss in general (I don't care about weighing a certain amount, I just want to weigh less)?
title: Weight loss motivation
